org.apache.flink.graph.library.clustering.directed

类 LocalClusteringCoefficient<K extends java.lang.Comparable<K> & CopyableValue<K>,VV,EV>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.graph.utils.proxy.GraphAlgorithmWrappingBase<K,VV,EV,DataSet<T>>
      • org.apache.flink.graph.utils.proxy.GraphAlgorithmWrappingDataSet<K,VV,EV,LocalClusteringCoefficient.Result<K>>

  • 类型参数:
    K - graph ID type
    VV - vertex value type
    EV - edge value type
    所有已实现的接口:
    GraphAlgorithm<K,VV,EV,DataSet<LocalClusteringCoefficient.Result<K>>>

    public class LocalClusteringCoefficient<K extends java.lang.Comparable<K> & CopyableValue<K>,VV,EV>
extends GraphAlgorithmWrappingDataSet<K,VV,EV,LocalClusteringCoefficient.Result<K>>
    The local clustering coefficient measures the connectedness of each vertex's neighborhood. Scores range from 0.0 (no edges between neighbors) to 1.0 (neighborhood is a clique).

    An edge between a vertex's neighbors is a triangle. Counting edges between neighbors is equivalent to counting the number of triangles which include the vertex.

    The input graph must be a simple graph containing no duplicate edges or self-loops.

    • 嵌套类概要

      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private static class  LocalClusteringCoefficient.CountTriangles<T>
      Sums the triangle count for each vertex ID.
      private static class  LocalClusteringCoefficient.JoinVertexDegreeWithTriangleCount<T>
      Joins the vertex and degree with the vertex's triangle count.
      static class  LocalClusteringCoefficient.Result<T>
      A result for the directed Local Clustering Coefficient algorithm.
      private static class  LocalClusteringCoefficient.SplitTriangles<T>
      Emits the three vertex IDs comprising each triangle along with an initial count.

      • setIncludeZeroDegreeVertices

        public LocalClusteringCoefficient<K,VV,EV> setIncludeZeroDegreeVertices(boolean includeZeroDegreeVertices)
        By default the vertex set is checked for zero degree vertices. When this flag is disabled only clustering coefficient scores for vertices with a degree of a least one will be produced.
        参数:
        includeZeroDegreeVertices - whether to output scores for vertices with a degree of zero
        返回:
        this
